entry.title: Since You've Been Gone
entry.summary:
Author: suberbantokyodrift

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,460Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Ten years ago you were in high school with Jason Todd and assigned as science partners. But a week after, he dies. His death shook you to the point you have to live with your divorced father in the Midwest. Ten years later, however, you move back to help take care of your ailing grandmother. Jason, however, is very much alive. Well, resurrected. And he doesn't plan on you leaving his life again.

entry.title: A Kind of Charming
entry.summary:
Author: Thereaintnosunshine

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,333Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: M. You have no name. You are simply M. Sure, you go by whatever name that starts with an M to your friends and coworkers. But, all you are is simply M on this planet. You tell people it’s because you’re an orphan. You say your parents died before they could name you because of a botched robbery during a home birth.It's a sob story for the ages. It makes people go quiet in disbelief, but it’s Gotham, and their standards of living were already unusually low.But it’s a lie. It’s all a lie. Because you’re not even human. You’re not from Earth. You’re not from this universe.You are a Toqnal, an alien species known to destroy everything inferior to them. You have four family members (you wish it were only two), but you have killed most of your full-blood species.But on Earth, you feel more at peace, so you’ve decided not to destroy this puny planet.Especially considering that your chest cavity pulsates at an unusual rhythm whenever a certain person is involved in your life.

entry.summary:

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,208Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Somewhere along the line, someone had told you that if you worked hard and honest, you could make a difference in people's lives. You moved to Gotham after college to help where help was needed. You knew it was a city that took time to understand, like familiarizing yourself with the cycles of a tide. What you didn't expect was how quickly you'd be pulled into the undertow.

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,809Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 192

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.
